strings.notfoundTitle: The chapter could not be loaded.

strings.filterTooltip: Search for terms/topics. Tip: Put an asterisk "*" before and/or after the search term to find more results.
strings.helpMessage:
Default search method: Word-exact.
Tip1: Put an asterisk "*" before and/or after the search term to find more results.
Tip2: You can also use logical operators: #{and}, #{or}, #{not}.
Example: creditor #{or} lawyer #{and} costs #{not} contract.
Note1: Spaces are treated as #{and}. If spaces are to be treated as part of the search expression, the search expression must be enclosed in inverted commas. E.g. "joint and several file".
Note2: Some general words (like "the") and characters such as the full stop are ignored in the search and therefore automatically removed from the search expression.
strings.loaderror: Full-text search could not be loaded.
